claim: Flublok is approved for adults 18 years and older
explanation: The image is a tabular summary of PCR-confirmed influenza cases, showing for each group the number of cases (n/N), attack rates, relative risk (RR), and relative vaccine efficacy (rVE) with 95% confidence intervals.
